entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 14 with temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with a few showers beginning in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 14 with temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
